group_1.textLeft: Thanks.

group_1.textRight: Maybe Torayamachi is right about witches coming @back.

group_1.textLeft: We'd only come out here to see if Yuna really set up gems on the bridges.
It was a nice surprise to bump into a witch.

group_1.textRight: So, what are we going to do?
Are you still planning on culling the number of @Magical Girls?

group_1.textLeft: You think I'm going to change plans just because we @ran into a single witch?
Why are you asking that all of a sudden?

group_1.textRight: Because that's not the reason you've been fighting, @is it?

group_1.textLeft: Not really.
Juri the Great just wants to crush Yuna.
Futatsugi was mine until she suddenly turned up @and stole it from me.
Not only did she defeat Juri the Great, @she forced me to join her.
Can you imagine how miserable that was for me?
I swore to myself that I'd pay her back for that @one day.

group_1.textRight: And now you've got a good excuse to do so, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
They say witches are coming back, but I can't just believe that.
So we're going to keep knocking down the number @of Magical Girls so we can keep going.
There's nothing wrong with doing that, is there?

group_1.textRight: Well, I'd rather do that than have a slow, @starving death.

group_1.textLeft: Heh. @You're such a weirdo, Ranka.
I'm sure most people would think I'm scum after hearing that.

group_1.textRight: I mean, I'm using your reputation for my own gains, @so I can't go pointing fingers.
Plus, now we know that girl who turned into a witch wasn't lying.
Torayamachi trying to spy on us like that proves @they're willing to fight.
So we have no choice but to fight, right?

group_1.textLeft: Well, if you're ready for it, I guess I can start doing things my way now.
... Let's tell the others to get ready.
We'll strike Torayamachi in two days.

group_1.textRight: But now that we've confirmed the gems here, what should we do?
Are we going to stick to the initial plan of using @East and West Oogibashi?

group_1.textLeft: Well...

select.textSelect: Use the East and West Bridges
Use the East and West Bridges
